text: Life is like riding a bicycle, to keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Life is short, but my bike ride is long.
author: null

text: The bicycle is a curious vehicle. Its passenger is its engine.
author: John Howard

text: I want to ride my bicycle, I want to ride it where I like.
author: Freddie Mercury

text: The bicycle is the noblest invention of mankind.
author: William Saroyan

text: The bicycle, the bicycle surely, should always be the vehicle of novelists and poets.
author: Christopher Morley

text: The bicycle is just as good company as most husbands and, when it gets old and shabby, a woman can dispose of it and get a new one without shocking the entire community.
author: Ann Strong

text: A bicycle ride around the world begins with a single pedal stroke.
author: Scott Stoll

text: Melancholy is incompatible with bicycling.
author: James E. Starrs

text: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
author: Charles M. Schulz

text: When life gets complicated, I ride.
author: null

text: A bicycle does get you there and more... And there is always the thin edge of danger to keep you alert and comfortably apprehensive.
author: Bill Emerson

text: A bicycle ride is a flight from sadness.
author: James E. Starrs

text: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
author: H.G. Wells

text: A bicycle is a revolution on wheels.
author: null

text: I like my money right where I can see it: hanging from my bicycle handlebar.
author: null

text: The best rides are the ones where you bite off much more than you can chew, and live through it.
author: Doug Bradbury

text: The bicycle is just as good company as most husbands and, when it gets old and shabby, a woman can dispose of it and get a new one without shocking the entire community.
author: Ann Strong

text: A bicycle ride is a flight from sadness.
author: James E. Starrs

text: I have always struggled to achieve excellence. One thing that cycling has taught me is that if you can achieve something without a struggle, it's not going to be satisfying.
author: Greg LeMond

text: Bicycling is the nearest approximation I know to the flight of birds. The airplane simply carries a man on its back like an obedient Pegasus; it gives him no wings of his own.
author: Louis J. Halle

text: The bicycle is a former child's toy that has now been elevated to icon status because, presumably, it can move the human form from pillar to post without damage to the environment.
author: Brock Yates

text: The bicycle is a simple solution to some of the world's most complicated problems.
author: Bill Strickland

text: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: When in doubt, pedal it out.
author: null

text: A bicycle ride is a flight from sadness.
author: James E. Starrs

text: Whenever I see an adult on a bicycle, I have hope for the human race.
author: H.G. Wells

text: Learn to ride a bicycle. You will not regret it if you live.
author: Mark Twain

text: Life is like riding a bicycle - to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Biking is not just about the destination, it's about the journey.
author: Unknown

text: The best rides are the ones where you bite off much more than you can chew and live through it.
author: Doug Bradbury

text: You can't be sad while riding a bicycle.
author: Unknown

text: I'm on a roll, on my way, I'm in control, oh, and I can't let go.
author: Ashley Tisdale

text: When in doubt, pedal it out.
author: Unknown

text: Life is short, but the ride is long.
author: Unknown

text: Don't waste your time looking back, you're not going that way.
author: Unknown

text: A bike ride a day keeps the doctor away.
author: Unknown

text: My best ideas come to me when I'm riding my bike.
author: Unknown

text: No matter how bad your day is, your bike is always there for you.
author: Unknown

text: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
author: Unknown

text: A bicycle ride around the world begins with a single pedal stroke.
author: Scott Stoll

text: The only time I feel alive is when I'm riding my bike.
author: Unknown

text: I feel my best when I'm on my bike.
author: Unknown

text: The journey of life is like a man riding a bicycle. We know he got on the bicycle and started to move. We know that at some point he will stop and get off. We know that if he stops moving and does not get off he will fall off.
author: William Golding

text: You never know what you're capable of until you get on a bike and ride.
author: Unknown

text: Life is like a ten-speed bike. Most of us have gears we never use.
author: Charles M. Schulz

text: I bike to escape from reality, but at the same time, I feel it helps me get closer to the real me.
author: Unknown

text: Riding a bike is like an art, something you do because you feel something inside.
author: Valentino Rossi

text: Biking: the cheapest therapy you can find.
author: Unknown

text: You can't buy happiness, but you can buy a bike and that's pretty close.
author: Unknown

text: Cycling is a healthy and rewarding activity that can be enjoyed by people of all ages, from young children to older adults.
author: Unknown

text: Two wheels move the soul.
author: Unknown

text: You don't have to be a hero to accomplish great things. You can just be a simple chap, sufficiently motivated to reach challenging goals.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

text: A bike ride is the perfect way to escape the noise and bustle of the city and experience nature.
author: Unknown

text: Life is like a bicycle, to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Unknown

text: When life gets complicated, I ride.
author: Unknown

text: Life is better on a bike.
author: Unknown

text: I ride to feel alive.
author: Unknown

text: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
author: H.G. Wells
